whisker, aren't both of those programs the front ends to the same command line programs... wouldn't they then have the same 'accuracy?'
ya can try linux vga=791 at the boot prompt ( thats an 1024x768)
or unpack a kernel source , go in Documentation and search for SVGA.txt to get more info about it
nope its not an RTFM is just an opotion
